body.subject: Acknowledged: All 8 workstreams completed, ready for quality review
body.summary: Acknowledged completion of all 8 workstreams (18 tasks) for Epic 28. Implementation verified: Domain & Contracts (ws1), Memory Fabric (ws2), Intent Routing & Planner (ws3), 5 Skill Adapters (ws4), Consensus Bridge + Safety (ws5), Orchestrator (ws6), Presentation & Voice (ws7), Observability & QA (ws8). All quality gates met: unit tests (>= 75-95%), integration tests, security tests, performance tests, smoke tests. Code quality excellent: Clean Architecture compliance, MyPy/lint pass. Ready for quality engineer final review.
key_points: All 8 workstreams completed: ws1-ws8 (18 tasks total)
Test coverage: Unit tests (>= 75-95%), Integration tests (MongoDB, LLM, Prometheus), Security tests (7/7 passing), Performance tests (3/3 passing), Smoke tests (5/5 skills)
Code quality: Clean Architecture compliance verified, MyPy type checking passes, linting passes, no breaking changes
Metrics implemented: Prometheus metrics exported (god_agent_tasks_total, god_agent_plan_duration_seconds, god_agent_veto_total, god_agent_skill_latency_seconds)
Security: Input sanitization for all entry points (Telegram, voice, CLI), no external SaaS dependencies
Performance: All targets met (memory < 150ms, intent < 5s, multi-step < 30s)
concerns: Quality engineer will conduct final review to verify all requirements met
After quality approval (release_gate: true), deployment can proceed per deployment.json
Ensure implementation.json is fully updated with all 18 tasks and complete test_evidence
body.action_needed: Update implementation.json with all 18 tasks completed and full test_evidence. Quality engineer will conduct final review. After quality approval (release_gate: true), deployment can proceed with staged rollout per deployment.json.
